texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information, visit abp.io.
texts.MyLittleBlog:CanNotOpenLockedPost: Can not Open a Locked Post! Unlock it first.
texts.MyLittleBlog:CanNotLockOpenedPost: Can not Lock a Opened Post! Close it first.
